name: backend

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../Frontend && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist -Recurse ../Backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Krishnendu M R-SAAS TECHNICAL DESIGN
description: This is the backend of the official Techofes 2025 website
